Player places the multiblock structure%0D%0A * 2. Player puts input items in Dispenser (e.g., 16x Netherrack)%0D%0A * 3. Player activates it (maybe right-click or close)%0D%0A * 4. If recipe matches, output is created%0D%0A */%0D%0Apublic class OreCrusherMachine %7B%0D%0A%0D%0A    // Ore Crusher recipes: input item IDs -%3E output RecipeItem%0D%0A    private static final Map%3CString, RecipeItem%3E CRUSHER_RECIPES = new HashMap%3C%3E();%0D%0A%0D%0A    static %7B%0D%0A        // Initialize crusher recipes%0D%0A        // Sulfate: 16x Netherrack %E2%86%92 1x Sulfate%0D%0A        addRecipe(new Sulfate(), %22netherrack:16%22);%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A    /**%0D%0A     * Helper method to add a recipe with sorted item IDs%0D%0A     */%0D%0A    private static void addRecipe(RecipeItem output, String... items) %7B%0D%0A        List%3CString%3E itemList = new java.util.ArrayList%3C%3E();%0D%0A        for (String item : items) %7B%0D%0A            // Add %22:1%22 if no quantity specified%0D%0A            if (!item.contains(%22:%22)) %7B%0D%0A                itemList.add(item + %22:1%22);%0D%0A            %7D else %7B%0D%0A                itemList.add(item);%0D%0A            %7D%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A        java.util.Collections.sort(itemList);%0D%0A        String recipeKey = String.join(%22,%22, itemList);%0D%0A        CRUSHER_RECIPES.put(recipeKey, output);%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A    /**%0D%0A     * Check if a valid Ore Crusher multiblock exists at this location.%0D%0A     * %0D%0A     * Structure (top-down block%0D%0A     * @return true if valid multiblock structure%0D%0A     */%0D%0A    public static boolean isValidStructure(Block centerBlock) %7B%0D%0A        // Check if center is a dispenser facing UP%0D%0A        if (centerBlock.getType() != Material.DISPENSER) %7B%0D%0A            return false;%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A        Dispenser dispenser = (Dispenser) centerBlock.getState();%0D%0A        if (dispenser.getFacing() != BlockFace.UP) %7B%0D%0A            return false;%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A        // Check if left and right are iron bars%0D%0A        Block left = centerBlock.getRelative(-1, 0, 0);%0D%0A        Block right = centerBlock.getRelative(1, 0, 0);%0D%0A        if (left.getType() != Material.IRON_BARS %7C%7C right.getType() != Material.IRON_BARS) %7B%0D%0A            return false;%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A        // Check if front has nether brick fence (at Z-1 or Z+1)%0D%0A        Block front = centerBlock.getRelative(0, 0, 1);%0D%0A        Block back = centerBlock.getRelative(0, 0, -1);%0D%0A        %0D%0A        boolean hasFenceInFront = front.getType() == Material.NETHER_BRICK_FENCE;%0D%0A        boolean hasFenceInBack = back.getType() == Material.NETHER_BRICK_FENCE;%0D%0A        %0D%0A        return hasFenceInFront %7C%7C hasFenceInBack;%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A    /**%0D%0A     * Get the dispenser from a valid Ore Crusher structure.%0D%0A     * %0D%0A     * @param centerBlock The center dispenser block%0D%0A     * @return The dispenser block, or null if not valid structure%0D%0A     */%0D%0A    public static Dispenser getDispenser(Block centerBlock) %7B%0D%0A        if (!isValidStructure(centerBlock)) %7B%0D%0A            return null;%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A        return (Dispenser)   * %0D%0A     * @param player The player who activated it%0D%0A     * @param crusherBlock The center dispenser block%0D%0A     */%0D%0A    public static void openCrusher(Player player, Block player.sendMessage(ChatColor.GREEN + %22Ore Crusher opened!%22);%0D%0A        player.sendMessage(ChatColor.GRAY + %22Place items in the crusher and close to process.%22);%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A    /**%0D%0A     * Process a recipe when the player closes the dispenser.%0D%0A     * Output goes into the dispenser or an adjacent chest.%0D%0A     *%0D%0A     * @param dispenser The dispenser inventory%0D%0A     * @param player The player who closed it%0D%0A     */%0D%0A    public static void processRecipe(Dispenser dispenser, Player player) %7B%0D%0A        Inventory inv = dispenser.getInventory();%0D%0A%0D%0A        // Build a map of item IDs and their quantities in the inventory%0D%0A        Map%3CString, Integer%3E itemCounts = new HashMap%3C%3E();%0D%0A%0D%0A        for (int i = 0; i %3C inv.getSize(); i++) %7B%0D%0A            ItemStack item = inv.getItem(i);%0D%0A            if (item == null) continue;%0D%0A%0D%0A            String itemId =    if (itemId != null) %7B%0D%0A                itemCounts.put(itemId, itemCounts.getOrDefault(itemId, 0) + item.getAmount());%0D%0A            %7D%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A        // Build recipe key from items in inventory%0D%0A        List%3CString%3E itemList = new java.util.ArrayList%3C%3E();%0D%0A        for (Map.Entry%3CString, Integer%3E entry : itemCounts.entrySet()) %7B%0D%0A            itemList.add(entry.getKey() + %22:%22 + entry.getValue());%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A        java.util.Collections.sort(itemList);%0D%0A        String recipeKey = String.join(%22,%22, itemList);%0D%0A%0D%0A        // Check if this matches a recipe%0D%0A        RecipeItem output = CRUSHER_RECIPES.get(recipeKey);%0D%0A        if (output != null) %7B%0D%0A            // Recipe matched! Clear all items and output the result%0D%0A            inv.clear();%0D%0A%0D%0A            ItemStack outputItem = output.getItemStack();%0D%0A%0D%0A            // Try to output to adjacent chest first, then dispenser%0D%0A            if (!outputToChest(dispenser.getBlock(), outputItem)) %7B%0D%0A                inv.addItem(outputItem);%0D%0A            %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A            player.sendMessage(ChatColor.GREEN + %22Crushed %22 + outputItem.getItemMeta().getDisplayName() + %22!%22);%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A    /**%0D%0A     * Get the item ID from an ItemStack's NBT data.%0D%0A     *%0D%0A     * @param item The item to check%0D%0A     * @return The item ID, or null if not a TechFactory item%0D%0A     */%0D%0A    private static String getItemId(ItemStack item) %7B%0D%0A        if (!item.hasItemMeta()) %7B%0D%0A            return null;%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A        var meta = item.getItemMeta();%0D%0A        var pdc = meta.getPersistentDataContainer();%0D%0A        var key = new org.bukkit.NamespacedKey(%22techfactory%22, %22item_id%22);%0D%0A%0D%0A        if (pdc.has(key, org.bukkit.persistence.PersistentDataType.STRING)) %7B%0D%0A            return pdc.get(key, org.bukkit.persistence.PersistentDataType.STRING);%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A        return null;%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A    /**%0D%0A     * Get vanilla item ID for recipe matching%0D%0A     */%0D%0A    private static String getVanillaItemId(ItemStack item) %7B%0D%0A        Material mat = item.getType();%0D%0A        switch (mat) %7B%0D%0A            case NETHERRACK: return %22netherrack%22;%0D%0A            default: return null;%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A    /**%0D%0A     * Try to output items to an adjacent chest.%0D%0A     * Checks all blocks adjacent to the crusher structure.%0D%0A     *%0D%0A     * @param dispenserBlock The dispenser block%0D%0A     * @param output The item to output%0D%0A     * @return true if output was successful, false if no chest found%0D%0A     */%0D%0A    private static boolean outputToChest(Block dispenserBlock, ItemStack output) %7B%0D%0A        // Check all 6 adjacent blocks around the dispenser%0D%0A        Block%5B%5D adjacent = %7B%0D%0A            dispenserBlock.getRelative(1, 0, 0),   // East%0D%0A            dispenserBlock.getRelative(-1, 0, 0),  // West%0D%0A            dispenserBlock.getRelative(0, 0, 1),   // South%0D%0A            dispenserBlock.getRelative(0, 0, -1),  // North%0D%0A Skip if this block is part of the multiblock structure%0D%0A            if (block.getType() == Material.IRON_BARS %7C%7C block.getType() == Material.NETHER_BRICK_FENCE) %7B%0D%0A                continue;%0D%0A            %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A            if (block.getType() == Material.CHEST %7C%7C block.getType() == Material.TRAPPED_CHEST) %7B%0D%0A                if (block.getState() instanceof chest.getInventory();%0D%0A%0D%0A                    // Try to add item to chest%0D%0A                    chestInv.addItem(output);%0D%0A                    return true;%0D%0A                %7D%0D%0A            %7D%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A        return false; // No chest found%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A    /**%0D%0A     * Break the multiblock and drop items.%0D%0A     * Called when any part of
